name: USCoreOrganizationAddress
description:
**A server defined search that may match any of the string fields in the Address, including line, city, district, state, country, postalCode, and/or text**  
**NOTE**: This US Core SearchParameter definition extends the usage context of the
[Conformance expectation extension](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extension-capabilitystatement-expectation.html)
 - multipleAnd
 - multipleOr
 - comparator
 - modifier
 - chain

text.div:
id us-core-organization-address

url : http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/SearchParameter/us-core-organization-address

version : 4.0.1

name : USCoreOrganizationAddress

derivedFrom : http://hl7.org/fhir/SearchParameter/Organization-address

status : active

date : 04/14/2022

publisher : HL7 International - Cross-Group Projects

contact : http://www.hl7.org/Special/committees/cgp

jurisdiction : United States of America (the) (Details : {urn:iso:std:iso:3166 code 'US' = 'United States of America', given as 'United States of America (the)'})

code : address

base :Organization

type : string

expression : Organization.address

xpath : f:Organization/f:address

xpathUsage : normal

multipleOr : True (Conformance Expectation = MAY)

multipleAnd : True ( Conformance Expectation = MAY)
